ratings.comment: Dan was AWESOME. He made boring content so much fun and was great at giving us advice/feedback about our group project. Super easy A and a whole lot of fun.

I loved Dr. Schaefer's class! He knew that his students had packed schedules and didn't try to make this class unnecessarily hard. He learned everyone's names and was always willing to give feedback or answer questions. His lectures are very engaging and he makes it a fun time.
learns about all of his students

Dan is awesome! Epic dude. He's fun and tries to make this class engaging. The whole semester is one big group project, and you get close with your groupmates. Also, the class is honestly super super easy.
